about.introduction:
Diego ha trabajado con emprendimientos, grandes empresas y con sus propias iniciativas tecnológicas por mas de 10 años, por lo que tiene una amplia mirada de que es lo que realmente significa el emprendimiento y entiende como combinarlo exitosamente con un foco comercial, lo cual es esencial, y un poderoso atributo, para un nuevo rol como asesor tecnológico o miembro de directorio.
Por otro lado, el ayuda con un gran equipo a grandes empresas como Falabella, Arauco, Forus, Sura y muchas otras, a transformar sus negocios digitales a través de una revolucionaria, disruptiva forma de pensar en el cambio de paradigma en nuevos modelos de negocios.
El puede entregar consejos, mentoría y conocimientos a emprendimos de su porfolio para levantar capital (Ha ayudado a levantar y gestionar levantamientos de capital por más de $5 millones de dólares en fondos públicos y privados), encontrando el real valor de sus tecnologías, mercado e industrias a través de diferentes estrategias disruptivas.
Hoy en día, maneja su propio portafolio de negocios tecnológicos, valorados en mas de $60 millones de dólares.

clients.description: I work with clients & partners from all sectors based on a shared value set and vision for how to create a better future through technology.

press.title:
Press and
thoughts
press.description: I love being able to share and help others achieve more through my work. These talks and interviews are my small contribution for a more open, connected and transparent industry.

articles.title:
The plans for the Softech
Startup of Cleverit
articles.description: They will invest a total of 20 million in lunching an area of entrepreneur incubation of the IT industry and accomplishing their global growth plan.

articles.title: Specialist talks about technology and innovation “made in Chile” that calls the attention of Europe
articles.description: Meanwhile the entire world is experiences changes produced by accelerated digital transformation, in Chile, with out exception of this trend, has arisen a series of digital and technological solutions, that are well received in Europe.

articles.title:
Social Medias and Innovation
for Entrepreneurs
articles.description: The pandemic and the confinement increase and extended the use of social networks. Their commercial use to offer products and services has increased. Regardless, at the same time these new digital buyers have become more active and demanding.

articles.title: How the pandemic has driving the interest in robots of companies
articles.description: The trends of the following years will be oriented towards medical robots, services and mainly focus on people with handicaps, neurodegenerative illnesses, or the elderly. Among them, many devices will help chores around the house.
